name: Defender (itch) (PJimmyB)
description:
Defend Galactic Stargate Authority colonists and eliminate Manti attackers in this classic side-scrolling shooter. Have fun blasting enemies while playing this exciting 2D, retro, 8 Bit, action, arcade, shoot 'em up. Go for a new high-score while enjoying the pixel art sprites in this radical retro, single-player, sci-fi, bullet hell, shooter.

Fly in your very own Defender spacecraft!

Use skill to avoid becoming a casualty of war!

Defend the GSA colonists from the evil Manti menace!

Take the fight to space where nobody can hear them scream!

Sharpen your skills against many different Manti enemies!

Beware!

Do your part for the Galactic Stargate Authority Today!

Press for game information!
